results.name: a(n) = A120963(2*n+1)/2.
reference: Weigel, D., Veysseyre, R., Phan, T., Effantin, J. M., & Billiet, Y. (1984). Crystallography, geometry and physics in higher dimensions. I. Point-symmetry operations. Acta Crystallographica Section A: Foundations of Crystallography, 40(4), 323-330. See Table 3.
maple: b:= proc(n) option remember; nops(invphi(n)) end:
